summary:
A Brazilian HR professional with more than 7 years of experience in the HR Industry, living in The Netherlands. 

Throughout my career, I was exposed to several different scenarios that gave me the ability to quickly adapt to difficult situations. As an HR Analyst, I had the chance to work with the day-to-day management of the HR operations (policies, procedures, programmes) as well as the recruitment process.

My energy comes from being proactive and delivering results with excellence always respecting the deadlines.

I believe that my soft skills allied with my ability to learn fast and my eagerness to achieve the targets provide me with a unique skill set to work in almost any industry.

profile_positions.description:
- Be the first point of contact for our new and current employees
- Take co-ownership of our company-wide onboarding program
- Provide advice and support on relocation, visa procedures and 30% rulings
- Organize and update personnel records in our internal HR systems
- Prepare HR documents
- Execute our monthly payroll for the Netherlands and US
- Manage our lease cars in the Netherlands
- Liaise with external partners, such as our pension- and arbo-partner
- Share the responsibility for the maintenance of the HR mailbox
- Ensure smooth and personal internal people processes
- Coordinate and facilitate employee engagement programs
profile_positions.title: Employee Experience Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Onboarding Customers Activities 
- Ensure the successful onboarding of the Enterprise customers and manage all of their onboarding experiences 
- Maintain a deep understanding of our product offerings and present back to our customers the most relevant features/functionality for their specific business needs 
- Secure successful launch for the customer’s community; driven by demonstrating the value of the products and services provided to the customer during the onboarding phase 
- Obtain scope of work from project owner to create a plan for setup construction/execution 
- Establish communication between project owner and client onboarding team 
- Establish document setup milestones to complete the project within budgeted hours 
- Maintain a log that tracks progress and milestones to communicate to the project owner
- Onboard additional resources as necessary to meet project objectives/expectations
- Provide best practice advice on document setup and linking procedures

Human Resources Activities
- Operational day to day sourcing, recruitment, assisting in interviewing and signing new employees
- Contract and salary management together with our Finance Department
- Coordinate the company recruitment activity
- Maintaining employee records and files
 - Being a go-to trust person for all HR related topics
profile_positions.title: Onboarding Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Specialising in English, bi-lingual & multi-lingual executive search, recruitment, contracting & temporary staffing.

Selecting and recruiting candidates’ at all professional levels, in order to meet client’s job requirements in an accurate and timely manner. Managing all stages of the recruitment process and maintaining ongoing relationships with clients and candidates in order to ensure the right match.

The know-how of Blue Lynx spans a broad spectrum of diverse disciplines: Accountancy, Sales, Logistics, Marketing, Engineering, HR, IT, Legal, CSR, Secretarial/Admin as well all Office Support; across a multi sector canvas of the world’s leading industries. This indicates the scope of Blue Lynx in its ability to provide seamless consulting solutions to international business within The Netherlands.

- Register and check incoming CVs in the Blue Lynx
- Customer Relationship Management, CRM, database
- Maintain accurate and up-to-date administration in the CRM throughout the whole recruitment cycle
- Maintain email correspondence with candidates, organising CVs and other admission documents
- Call and meet with newly registered candidates for a general meeting
- Liaise with candidates by telephone and email to schedule interviews
- Maintain constant communication with recruiters regarding newly registered candidates
- Answer general telephone calls and inform callers about our services
- Coordinate appointments
- Work in close cooperation with recruitment consultants
- Prepare and advertise job vacancies on our websites
- Communicate with candidates regarding job vacancies
- Source, qualify and select suitable candidates for job vacancies from the database and job site CV databases
- Welcome visitors and general day to day office duties
profile_positions.title: Recruitment Support and Researcher

profile_positions.description:
- Be the first point of contact for our new and current employees
- Manage and execute all steps of the recruitment process, ensuring to attract the right candidates
- Oversee the Onboarding Program, making sure that new hires are welcomed and integrated into the company in a seamless manner
- Conduct and analyze offboarding interviews, identifying any areas for improvement in our HR processes or company culture
- Support the management team in all employee relations processes and cases (performance appraisals, compensatory hours, training) 
- Analyze and review HR results, ensuring that we meet our KPI targets (Open  Vacancies, Headcount, Turn Over, Absenteeism)
- Prepare KPI presentations for the Executive Staff to report on progress and identify areas for improvement
- Plan and organize townhalls, monthly meetings, training sessions, and special events
- Control the HR budget and allocate resources accordingly
- Write HR communications and standard documents, ensuring that all staff members are up-to-date with HR policies and procedures
- Report and follow up with the facilities department about any issues or concerns that may impact staff members
- Keep the company’s organogram up to date, ensuring that it accurately reflects our organizational structure and staffing needs
profile_positions.title: HR Analyst Generalist

profile_positions.title: HR Business Partner

- All customer service
- Write insurance contracts and endorsements
- Close the customer’s invoice
profile_positions.title: Junior Insurance Technician
